question: Which former footballer has won the 2019 UEFA Presidentâ€™s Award?
explanation: Eric Cantona, the former Manchester United forward and France legend , has been awarded the UEFA President\'s Award in Monaco in recognition of his playing career and commitment to charitable causes after it. Cantona won four Premier League titles in five years with United in the 1990s and scored 64 goals for the Old Trafford club in 143 appearances.
